_comment: Onboarding Flow Q1-Q4 Configuration based on onboarding-flow-main.md and approach2.md

q1.question: What's been the hardest to manage lately?
q1.subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience.

options.label: Fatigue / Low energy
options.description: Frequent crashes, post-exertional malaise (PEM), can't get going

options.label: Unpredictable flares
options.description: Sudden 'bad days' you can't plan for

options.label: Something else
options.description: Your main issue isn't listed above

fatigue.question: What do you hope to figure out about your fatigue?

options.label: When during the day I'm most fatigued vs. when I have energy
If certain activities (exercise, outings) are causing me to crash
Whether better sleep improves my energy levels
How my fatigue and mood might be connected
No specific focus - I'll track everything and see what comes up

flares.question: What do you want to figure out about those flares?

options.label: What might be triggering my flare-ups
If I can spot any early warning signs before a flare
Whether my treatments or routines are reducing my flares
If flares follow any pattern (e.g. time of month or activity)
Not sure yet - I just need to log flares and look for patterns later

migraines.question: What do you hope to understand about your migraines?

options.label: Which foods or drinks might trigger my migraines
If weather changes (humidity, storms) correlate with my headaches
Whether my migraines are linked to hormonal cycles
If stress or poor sleep are setting off my migraines
I don't know yet - I'll track them and see if any pattern emerges

ibs_gut.question: What would you like to understand about your digestive issues?

options.label: Which foods might be causing my GI flare-ups
If stress or anxiety is making my symptoms worse
What time of day my gut issues are most intense
Whether my diet or medications are improving my symptoms
No specific idea - I'll track everything and look for trends

multiple.question: What's your biggest challenge with managing multiple conditions?

options.label: Figuring out which condition is causing what symptom
Juggling different medications or treatments for each
Seeing all my symptoms in one combined timeline
Prioritizing which issue to tackle first
Tracking it all without getting overwhelmed

other.question: What would you like to focus on by tracking your health?

options.label: Find patterns or triggers for my symptoms
Track if my new treatment or habit is making a difference
Have a log I can share with my doctor (or keep for myself)
See overall trends in my health over time
I'm just curious - I want to try tracking and see what I learn

q3._comment: Q3 is the baseline check-in widget. Each Q1+Q2 combination maps to a specific widget.

energy_envelope.question: Where is your battery level right now compared to your absolute best?

good_days_trap.question: How was your activity level yesterday compared to usual?

sleep_impact.question: On average, how many hours of sleep do you get per night?

mood_connection.question: How much has fatigue affected your mood lately?

track_all.question: On how many days in the past week did you feel completely exhausted?

triggers.question: Do you suspect any of these triggers for your flare-ups?

early_warning.question: Do you notice any warning signs before a flare hits?

treatments.question: Are you currently doing anything to prevent flares?

pattern.question: How predictable have your flares been so far?

logging.question: How many flare-ups did you have in the last month?

food_triggers.question: Which of these foods or drinks do you suspect trigger your migraines?

weather.question: Do weather changes (storms, humidity, etc.) seem to trigger your headaches?

hormonal.question: Do your migraines align with hormonal changes (e.g. your menstrual cycle)?

stress_sleep.question: How much do stress or poor sleep seem to bring on your headaches?

no_pattern.question: How many migraine days did you have in the past month?

food_triggers.question: Any foods you suspect are triggering your digestive issues?

stress_impact.question: Does stress typically make your gut symptoms worse?

timing.question: When do your digestive symptoms bother you most?

treatment_effect.question: Are you following any diet or treatment for this, and does it seem to help?

no_idea.question: How many days per week do you experience noticeable gut symptoms?

symptom_overlap.question: Do you often feel unsure which condition is causing a symptom?

competing_needs.question: How many different medications or treatments are you managing right now?

unified_timeline.question: How are you currently tracking your conditions?

prioritizing.question: Which condition or symptom is bothering you the most right now?
prioritizing.placeholder: e.g., fatigue, joint pain, brain fog...

overwhelm.question: On a scale of 1-10, how overwhelmed do you feel managing your health lately?

patterns.question: Do you suspect any general triggers for your symptoms?

new_treatment.question: Are you trying a new treatment or habit that you want to monitor?

doctor_log.question: Do you plan to share your symptom logs with a doctor or specialist?

trends.question: Lately, would you say your condition is getting better, worse, or staying the same?

curious.question: Out of the past 30 days, about how many were 'good' (relatively symptom-free) days for you?
